Killeen.Killeen Mall:
Killeen Mall is a 557,418-square-foot (51,785.8 m2) shopping mall located in Killeen, Texas located on 63.1 acres (25.5 ha). It is owned and managed by Jones Lang Lasalle. Opened in 1981, it has 100 stores. The original anchors were Bealls, Sears, and O. G. Wilson Catalog Showroom, owned by Zale Corporation (later Best Products).
Killeen Mall is one of two regional malls in Bell County, with the other being Temple Mall, in nearby Temple.
